UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and secondary structure of a novel peptide derived from ovalbumin
Literature.Author: Tan A, Suzuki R, Yokoyama C, Yano S, Konno H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12993(MIC=50µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus NBRC 3333(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 3972(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas putida NBRC 100650(MIC=50µg/ml),Aspergillus oryzae NBRC 100959(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Candida viswanathii NBRC 10321(MIC=12.5µg/ml)
